channel.title: New Half-Life Fan Film
channel.description:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NvgEx1g9dW4']Watch it here.[/url]
This is definitely one of the better ones I've seen. Well acted, looks authentic, and done on a tiny budget!

item.title: New Half-Life Fan Film
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
The practical effects were really well done. Freeman’s name drop was a little too “Bond” for my tastes, but I definitely want to see more.

item.title: New Half-Life Fan Film
item.dc:creator: Hezus
item.description:
brokenfridgehinge:

Could have been the topside dorms?

Could have been, but then I would expect a different type of environment, since Black Mesa is in the New Mexico desert.

If you take a good look at the style of the house (the woodwork, old paint layers) it just doesn’t seem how a huge trillion-dollar company like Black Mesa would house their staff. Also doesn’t really compare to the architecture you find on the surface level in HL1.

But of course I’m nitpicking here. Well done, nonetheless.

Read full topic

item.title: New Half-Life Fan Film
item.dc:creator: Mented
item.description:
Ok that is the only fan film based on HL-1 I’d consider any good.

I thought the best part about it WAS the guy playing Gordon. I always have a problem with HEV suits though and the outfits in general as I’ve never seen one that looks more than a cosplay outfit, but it’s a fan film.

Read full topic

item.title: New Half-Life Fan Film
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
He could have said more and I’d be okay with it. For a film it fits, it’s a given that characters should talk to not just “be there.” FPS games are nice without protagonist voices, but they made this work.

Read full topic

item.title: New Half-Life Fan Film

item.description:
I enjoyed it would like to have seen more but pretty cool! Saying his name I think was completely fine!

item.title: New Half-Life Fan Film
item.dc:creator: Llewen_Ebag
item.description:
Very nicely done. The HEV suit and the headcrabs looked really good.

Also, come people, he HAS to speak sometimes. How do you think he went through MIT? Gesturing? And I don’t think he really is mute. Just a man of few words.

Also, Jethrosoup, what fandoms are the 1st and 2nd? Portal and CoD?

Read full topic

item.title: New Half-Life Fan Film
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Yeah, very, very nice. A few of the earlier lines seemed a teeny bit forced, but it might just be me. I’m glad Freeman actually made sounds and had a voice! It wasn’t bad at all, I liked it.

Oh, I wish I had this in higher quality. I have a bit of an affinity for green eyes and I find this awesome.

Read full topic

item.description:
writing was very well done imo. 10/10.

item.title: New Half-Life Fan Film
item.dc:creator: Jethrosoup
item.description:
For me, the only thing about having someone play Gordon Freeman in a video breaks the immersion in a sense. When you play Half-Life, you’re not just controlling a character, it’s﻿ as if you actually ARE Gordon because you control him in pretty much every way. Seeing another Gordon and hearing him speak kinda breaks that for me in a way.

jesus fucking christ this is the… third worst fandom

Edit: DIRECTED BY IAN DUNCAN???

Read full topic
